docs.snippet: Battered by sordid new accusations of sexual misbehavior, Donald Trump fought back in ever-more-remarkable fashion Friday, acting out one woman's allegation onstage and suggesting another was not attractive enough to merit his attention. He defian...
docs.lead_paragraph: Battered by sordid new accusations of sexual misbehavior, Donald Trump fought back in ever-more-remarkable fashion Friday, acting out one woman's allegation onstage and suggesting another was not attractive enough to merit his attention. He defiantly denied a week's worth of accusations that have all but consumed his presidential bid just over three weeks before the election.

headline.main: New Allegations of Sexual Misconduct Rock Trump Campaign
headline.print_headline: New Allegations of Sexual Misconduct Rock Trump Campaign

docs.snippet: With Donald Trump’s U.S. election prospects dimming and controversy swirling around him, future Republican presidential hopefuls may be weighing whether standing by their man is the savvy move....

docs.snippet: A national police organization's endorsement of Donald Trump has exposed a divide within the ranks of law enforcement: Can they support someone who calls himself the law-and-order candidate but was caught on tape bragging about sexually predatory ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A national police organization's endorsement of Donald Trump has exposed a divide within the ranks of law enforcement: Can they support someone who calls himself the law-and-order candidate but was caught on tape bragging about sexually predatory behavior toward women?

headline.main: Trump Endorsement by Police Group Exposes Divide Among Ranks

docs.snippet: Republican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday charged that the women accusing him of sexual misconduct fabricated their stories to damage his campaign after two more women came forward with allegations that he had groped them....

docs.snippet: Bill de Blasio, caught between his soaring rhetoric as a candidate and the realities of being New York City’s mayor, is disappointing many who supported him....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio, caught between his soaring rhetoric as a candidate and the realities of being New York City’s mayor, is disappointing many who supported him.
docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's vows to reform Police Dept may become burden to him as he approaches re-election battle in 2017; dissent is growing among black voters who put him in office, disappointed that he has not announced any new police reform initiatives; his re-election campaign asserts crime is down, with big drop in low-level arrests and police stops.

headline.main: De Blasio’s Police Reform Pledges May Burden His Re-election Bid
headline.print_headline: Policing Vows Could Burden  De Blasio in ’17

docs.snippet: A state judge in North Carolina gave residents in counties hit hard by Hurricane Matthew five extra days to register to vote after Democrats sued to get an extension to Friday's deadline, while a federal judge ordered an extension in one Georgia c...
docs.lead_paragraph: A state judge in North Carolina gave residents in counties hit hard by Hurricane Matthew five extra days to register to vote after Democrats sued to get an extension to Friday's deadline, while a federal judge ordered an extension in one Georgia county.

headline.main: North Carolina Democrats Win Extension of Voter Registration Deadline
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Democrats Win Extension of Voter Registration Deadline

docs.snippet: Americans traveling to Cuba will be allowed to bring home more of the communist-ruled island's coveted cigars and rum under new measures announced by the U.S. government on Friday to further ease trade, travel and financial restrictions that have ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Americans traveling to Cuba will be allowed to bring home more of the communist-ruled island's coveted cigars and rum under new measures announced by the U.S. government on Friday to further ease trade, travel and financial restrictions that have been in place for decades.

headline.main: Obama Eases Restrictions on Cuba, Lifts Limits on Rum and Cigars
headline.print_headline: Obama Eases Restrictions on Cuba, Lifts Limits on Rum and Cigars
